trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"> </xref> 개체에 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The GridTableStylesCollection contains <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects that allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control to display a customized grid style for each <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: GridTableStylesCollection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>각 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> 사용자 지정 된 표 스타일을 표시 하도록 컨트롤</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> 을 허용 하는 개체</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> 를 포함합니다.

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property returns the GridTableStylesCollection.
By default, the GridTableStylesCollection does not contain any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects.
Instead, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> displays each table using default settings for color, width, and formatting.
trans-unit.target: 대신,는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>색, 너비 및 서식 지정에 대 한 기본 설정을 사용 하 여 각 테이블을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: All columns of each table are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 각 테이블의 모든 열이 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> is added to the collection, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to determine which object supplies the data for the grid.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>는 컬렉션에 추가 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>표에 대 한 데이터를 제공 하는 개체를 확인 하려면.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> must match the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of one of the objects.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 데이터 원본이 <xref:System.Data.DataSet>세 개를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>일치 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>개체 중 하나입니다.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> does not match any of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> values, the default settings will be used to display data for each table, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> settings will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>일치 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>값, 설정 각 테이블에 대 한 데이터를 표시 하는 기본 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>설정이 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the GridTableStylesCollection.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 항상 만들기 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>개체에 추가 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>추가 하기 전에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>개체는 GridTableStylesCollection.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 빈을 추가 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>유효한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>를 컬렉션에 값 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>개체가 자동으로 생성 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>중복 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> 값</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> 을 가진 개체</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> 를 추가 하려고 하면 예외가 throw 될 결과적으로,

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Clear%2A> method.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to this collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index of the newly added object.
Adds an array of table styles to the collection.
An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> objects.
Clears the collection.
Occurs when the collection has changed.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 변경 될 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"> </xref> 에 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to look for.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified table style exists in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>지정한 테이블 스타일 컬렉션에 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> specified by index.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add items to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A>메서드는 컬렉션에 항목을 추가 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to get.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> at the specified index.
No item exists at the specified index.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> with the specified name.

When retrieving a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property uses a case-insensitive comparison.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add items to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A>메서드는 컬렉션에 항목을 추가 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A>

The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName*>.
Gets the underlying list.
An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that contains the table data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> 테이블 데이터를 포함 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> containing the event data.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> exists before using the Remove method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A>특정 확인할 수 있는 방법은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>Remove 메서드를 사용 하기 전에 있는지.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to remove.
Removes a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> at the specified index.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> exists before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A>특정 확인할 수 있는 방법은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>사용 하기 전에 있는지는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Remove%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to remove.
Copies the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 호환 되는&1; 차원 복사 <xref:System.Array>대상 배열의 지정된 된 인덱스부터 시작 합니다.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 배열에는&0;부터 시작 하는 인덱스가 있어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 복사를 시작할 배열 인덱스는&0;부터 시작을 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: array is null.
index is less than zero.
array is multidimensional.
-or- The number of elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref> is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: -또는-에 있는 요소의 수는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"> </xref> 대상 배열의 끝 인덱스에서 사용 가능한 공간 보다 큽니다.

trans-unit.source: The type in the collection cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 형식은 대상 배열의 형식으로 자동 캐스팅할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items contained in the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 액세스 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection"> </xref> 이 동기화 되었으면 (스레드로부터 안전 하 게 보호).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>컬렉션에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 하는 데 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for the collection.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the collection.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to this collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index of the newly added object.
value cannot be cast to a .
value has already been assigned to a .
-or- A in has the same property value as value.
Clears the collection.
Determines whether an element is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 요소가 있는지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the collection.
The value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if value is found in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컬렉션에 값이 있으면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 지정된 된 개체의 첫 번째 요소의&0;부터 시작 인덱스를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the collection.
The value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the entire collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 전체 컬렉션에서 값의 첫 번째 발생 인덱스는&0;부터 시작 하는 경우 반환 합니다. 그렇지 않으면-1입니다.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList.Insert*> method.
Always throws <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
You cannot insert an item into the middle of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 중간에 항목을 삽입할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
The object to insert into the collection.
Always thrown.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 크기가 고정 되어 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션이 읽기 전용인 지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 인덱스에 요소를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element.
The element at the specified index.
The item property cannot be set.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to remove from the collection.
value cannot be cast to a .
Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 제거는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> 컬렉션에서 지정 된 인덱스를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> to remove.
